name: PetsNET - Raise a pet online
description:
Raise a pet with PetsNET. Feed, clean, tickle or heal your pet.

- Real time weather conditions (in short - if it rains outside, it will rain in the game, too)
- Multiplayer - help the pets of your Facebook friends
- Different items to give to your pet
- Different houses
- Stunning master artist graphics
- Special sound effects for every weather condition
